author: Windsorlego
title: Little Quackers
review:
This is a very small set indeed consisting of just ten pieces of Lego.  It doesn't take long to make the designs shown on the leaflet.

It's one of those sets where you have to break up one design to make another one.

This would be ideal for a young child as a starter Lego kit.

I actually added pieces from my own collection of spares to make all the designs shown in the leaflet without breaking up a previous one.

Playability - well there isn't really any play factor in this set.  A young child could make some quacking noises but that's about it.

Value for money is not good unless you can get the set for a very low price.

As I said earlier this would be a bit of fun for a young child.

author: neverbrick
title: WOW!
review: Epic fun with playing this set. I received it at LEGO event. It includes only 10 parts, but things that I can build are endless!
